text: Ko'ma tamasami'na henkama fore hugahie hu'nama hu'noa zantamina ko fore higeta ke'naze. Hianagi tamagra tamage hu'ne huta ana zankura huamara osu'naze. Ana hu'neankina kora ontamasami'noa zantami kasefa zantaminku menina neramasamina, oku'ama frakinoma megeta onke'naza zantamina eri ama hu'na tamasamigahue.
